params._index: Index of compute instance which challenger is starting the VG.
Index of compute instance that the challenger is confirming the claim.

params._maxCycle: number of instructions until the machine is forcibly halted
params._picoSecondsToRunInsn: time the offchain will take to run one instruction

params._finalTime: max cycle of the machine for that computation
params._initialHash: hash in which both claimer and challenger agree on
params._machineAddress: address of the machine that will run the instruction

params._claimedFinalHash: hash of the machine after computation is completed.
params._index: Index of instance that the claimer is interacting with
Index of compute instance which challenger is starting the VG.

challenge(uint256).notice: Challenger disputes the claim, starting a verification game.

submitClaim(uint256,bytes32).notice: Claimer claims the hash of the result of a computation

winByVG(uint256).notice: In case one of the parties wins the verification game, then he or she can call this function to claim victory in this contract as well.
